value.title: StarCraft 2: The MYSTERIOUS Terran! (PartinG vs TIME)
value.excerpt: TIME does not seem to participate in nearly as many StarCraft 2 events outside of China as he used to. It's been far too long since I casted one of this games, so in today's best-of-3 series he goes up against the top level Protoss player PartinG.  Support my work on Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/lowkotv
